events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back because of a wrong product.
An agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle the customer's case regarding their incorrect order.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund swiftly?
Sure, my order number is 789654123 and I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect product that I got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and provide you with a prepaid return label.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and support in resolving this issue promptly.
We have processed your refund and emailed the return shipping label to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
As we have not heard otherwise, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and we hope to serve you better in the future.
Please take a moment to complete a short satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
